title.v: Chọn định mức nguyên vật liệu

command.text:
declare @fields nvarchar(512), @keyMaster nvarchar(1024), @keyFlow nvarchar(4000), @$none nvarchar(512), @roundQuantity int, @roundRate int
select @keyMaster = '', @fields = '' select @keyFlow = '', @$none = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Không có định mức nguyên vật liệu theo điều kiện đang lọc.' else N'No data matching filter condition.' end select @roundQuantity = val from options where name = 'm_round_sl' select @roundRate = val from options where name = 'm_round_tl'
declare @vcID varchar(32), @Rate numeric(16, 5), @productID varchar(32), @productName nvarchar(512), @vcFields nvarchar(512), @retrieveID char(13), @i int, @l int, @c smalldatetime, @d smalldatetime, @t varchar(128), @s nvarchar(4000) select @productID = ltrim(rtrim(@ma_sp)) select @productName = case when @@language = 'v' then ten_vt else ten_vt2 end from dmvt where ma_vt = @productID
if exists(select 1 from idm where ma_sp = @ma_sp) begin select @retrieveID = stt_rec from idm where ma_sp = @ma_sp goto Retrieve end select 'ma_sp' as field, @$none as message return
Retrieve: select @vcID = @retrieveID, @d = @ngay_ct2, @Rate = he_so from phdm where ma_sp = @ma_sp
select '' as field, '' as message, 'on$&Identity;Filter$Retrieve$QueryComplete(this, ''' + replace(replace(@productID, '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''', ''' + replace(replace(@productName, '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''', ''' + @vcID + ''', ''' + convert(char(8), @d, 112) + ''', ''' + replace(replace(rtrim(round(@t_so_luong/@Rate, @roundQuantity)), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''', ''' + replace(replace(rtrim(round(@he_so/@Rate, @roundRate)), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''');' as script return
